sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，这项研究应该促使各国重新考虑药品的分类。

sentences.english: But such data has not been forthcoming from the countries of the region.
sentences.chinese: 但是这样的数据在该地区的各国并非唾手可得。

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平稳定是本地区各国发展的必要条件。

sentences.english: Welcome the various countries user to select " Bai Yue" the sign miniature bulb.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎世界各国用户选用“白月”牌小灯泡。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 东欧各国都为简化商业手续至少采取了一项措施。

sentences.english: He says progress towardld the eight goals should be judged nation-by-nation.
sentences.chinese: 他说这八个目标的进程应从各国的角度来裁定。

sentences.english: Now many countries are developing the production technique of magnesia-carbon brick.
sentences.chinese: 各国都在大力开发镁碳砖生产技术。

sentences.english: On the utilization of creative study in marketing;
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍世界各国研究和应用创造学的概况。

sentences.english: Black-tie dinners and champagne parties were being held in the capitals of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲各国首都则举行了一连串正式庆祝晚宴。

sentences.english: The corruption of administrative power is a headachy problem, which plagues most countries and their people.
sentences.chinese: 行政权力腐败是一个令各国政府和人民头痛的问题。

sentences.english: This database presents and links to English-language information about HIV/AIDS-related statutes from countries in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 本数据库主要提供亚洲各国与艾滋病有关的法律法规。

sentences.english: The intelligence report is understood to have been issued to European navies.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，这份情报报告已经被分发到欧洲各国海军。

sentences.english: The governments around the world are expressing interest in this new emerging field.
sentences.chinese: 各国政府都对这一新领域表现出兴趣。

sentences.english: The use of informants detection has become an important means in investigation practice.
sentences.chinese: 利用线人破案已成为各国侦查实践中的重要手段。

sentences.english: The ordered development of the Singapore society is always approved by the countries all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡社会的有序发展向来被世界各国所认同。

sentences.english: Chinese editorials said South-East Asians should not be hoodwinked by imperialists.
sentences.chinese: 中方各大报纸表示东南亚各国不应让帝国主义哄骗。

definition: all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
